page.title: 13Communications in Beckermet
page.content: Nearly everyone in our area has a telephone. As there are many isolated farms and houses this is an essential means of communication. All the telephone numbers in our village have 3 digits. The local area code is 84 and the national code is 0946. The Postal Service is an important means of communication.Post arrives at the Post Office, from Whitehaven, at a.m. The post is delivered by the Post Lady who has 231 places she could visit. She enjoys her job and goes round the area on her bicycle accompanied by the Golden Labrador dog owned by the Sub Postmistress. There is a local dialect which is sometimes used in verbal communications with words such as beck - stream, yam - home, scrunt -apple core, dyke -hedge. Numbers used by farmers are 1-yan, 2-tan, 3-tethera, 4-nethera, 5-pip.
